member.name: T:Infragistics.Olap.IRemoteRequestSerializer
member.summary: Provides base interface for serializing requests to XMLA service.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Olap.IRemoteRequestSerializer.SerializeRequest(Infragistics.Olap.RemoteRequest)
member.summary: Serializes the specified request.
member.returns: The string of the serialized request.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Olap.IRemoteRequestSerializer.DeserializeRequest(System.String)
member.summary: Deserializes the request.
member.param: The string of the serialized request.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Olap.IRemoteResponseSerializer
member.summary: Provides base interface for serializing response from XMLA service.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Olap.IRemoteResponseSerializer.SerializeResponse(System.Object,Infragistics.Olap.RemoteRequestType)
member.summary: Serializes the specified response.
member.returns: The string of the serialized response.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Olap.IRemoteResponseSerializer.DeserializeResponse(System.String,Infragistics.Olap.RemoteRequestType)
member.summary: Deserializes the response.
member.param: The string of the serialized response.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Olap.RemoteRequest
member.summary: Provides an object for remote requests to XMLA service.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Olap.RemoteRequest.Type
member.summary: Gets or sets the request type.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Olap.RemoteRequest.Properties
member.summary: Gets or sets the additional properties applied to Discover/Execute request.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Olap.RemoteRequest.Restrictions
member.summary: Gets or sets the additional restrictions applied to Discover request.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Olap.RemoteRequest.Parameters
member.summary: Gets or sets the additional parameters applied to Execute request.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Olap.RemoteRequest.Statement
member.summary: Gets or sets the statement of Command element applied to Execute request.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Olap.RemoteRequestType
member.summary: Specifies the supported rquest types sent to XMLA service.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.RemoteRequestType.DiscoverCatalogs
member.summary: Identifies a request about physical attributes associated with catalogs accessible from the Olap service.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.RemoteRequestType.DiscoverCubes
member.summary: Identifies a request about the structure of cubes accessible from the Olap service.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.RemoteRequestType.DiscoverDimensions
member.summary: Identifies a request about the shared and private dimensions accessible from the Olap service.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.RemoteRequestType.DiscoverHierarchies
member.summary: Identifies the request about each hierarchy within a particular dimension accessible from the Olap service.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.RemoteRequestType.DiscoverLevels
member.summary: Identifies a request about each level within a particular hierarchy accessible from the Olap service.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.RemoteRequestType.DiscoverMeasures
member.summary: Identifies a request about each measure within a cube accessible from the Olap service.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.RemoteRequestType.DiscoverMeasureGroups
member.summary: Identifies a request about the measure groups accessible from the Olap service.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.RemoteRequestType.DiscoverMeasureGroupDimensions
member.summary: Identifies a request about the dimensions of measure groups accessible from the Olap service.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.RemoteRequestType.DiscoverMembers
member.summary: Identifies a request about the members accessible from the Olap service.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.RemoteRequestType.DiscoverKpis
member.summary: Identifies a request about the KPis accessible from the Olap service.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.RemoteRequestType.ExecuteStatement
member.summary: Identifies a request that sends XMLA commands to XMLA service.
